sentences.english: “We have done this every June for nineteen years, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 每年逢六月，我們這樣做，現已經有十九年了。

sentences.english: This is a car race near our town every year. In1995, there was a …
sentences.chinese: 這是一場汽車角逐在我們鎮子四周每年都有。

sentences.english: The annual traditional festival Mid-Autumn Festival, countless lovers and eventually became dependents places.
sentences.chinese: 每年的中秋傳統佳節，無數的有情人終成眷宿。

sentences.english: Do you know how much you spend on clothes and groceries annually?
sentences.chinese: 你知道你每年要爲衣服和雜貨花費多少嗎？

sentences.english: The mochi-making assembly is an annual tradition of the Yamaguchi-gumi.
sentences.chinese: 搗麻糬大會是山口組每年的慣例。

sentences.english: Plastic plates and cups also make up 0.5 percent of our trash every year (PDF), and those products induce plenty of environmental agita.
sentences.chinese: 每年廢棄的膠杯和膠碟也在垃圾中佔據0。

sentences.english: With more forests being destoryed, huge quantities of good earth are washed away each year.
sentences.chinese: 由於更多森林被破壞，每年有大量的好土壤流失掉了。

sentences.english: The picking time for spring teas in China is usually from March to early May.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，春茶的採摘時間通常是每年的三月至五月初。

sentences.english: But remember this auspicious month comes but once a year.
sentences.chinese: 但要記得，吉慶的齋月，每年只有一次。

sentences.english: Malabo is one of the schools that is affected annually.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉博就是其中一所每年都被影響的學校。

sentences.english: How much alloted for annual marketing efforts in total?
sentences.chinese: 每年你可用於營銷活動的費用分配是多少？

sentences.english: Each year, an estimated 500 billion to 1 trillion plastic bags are consumed worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 每年全球的膠袋使用量估計有5千億到1萬億個。

sentences.english: My grandpa told me there was people coming for it each year.
sentences.chinese: 外公說，每年這裏都會有收藥材的人上山。

sentences.english: At this time of the year farmers to capalternating currentity to plow their fields.
sentences.chinese: 每年這個時辰，農民們濫觴犁地。

sentences.english: And we had competitions and choir and music every year.
sentences.chinese: 並且我們每年都會有比賽，合唱團和其他音樂節目。

definition: year after year/with each passing year/over the years
within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
